class.name: darknet_multiplexer/Multiplexer
class.description: Funnels occam and downcam frames into darknet on a single topic. Configurable via rosservice.

class.name: darknet_multiplexer/DarknetDrawer
class.description: Draws on images according to the bounding box and republishes the image.

class.name: darknet_multiplexer/GetClasses
class.description: Records the classes currently available in darknet for a period of time.
